name: Moral
description:
Moral is a Visual Novel where you play as a Newly recruited Yakuza. Your superior try and test if your fit for the role and test your moral. It was made for a 48h Jam.

Art by Noot : https://twitter.com/Nootmyproblem

Story and Code by Kakera : https://twitter.com/MKakera

-Choices based on visuals and symbols cards,

-Beautiful Visuals,

-Interesting story.
